actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide a special Federal matching rate with respect to medical assistance provided to certain Indians.

summary.text: Provides, under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act, for Federal matching rate with respect to medical assistance provided to Indians eligible for services under the Indian Health Service program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide a special Federal matching rate with respect to medical assistance provided to certain Indians.
